hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: OTHERTEST
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Enable / Disable the complete set of tests.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: ACTIVATE_OPTIM_CAPA
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Enable / Disable the capacity optimization Python functions.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: USE_LABELS
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Select the test to be performed using labels

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: REMOVE_TEST_DIR
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Remove and reconstruct the test direction

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: RM_ENABLE_XPRESS_PACKING
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Include Xpress shared libraries in archive

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: RM_ENABLE_LICENSES_PACKING
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Include COE (and Xpress if relevant) licenses in the archive

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GERRIT_REFSPEC
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Variable to allow the project to be built without Jenkins
